sentences: Peter Okoye (born 18 November 1981), who is better known as Mr P, is a Nigerian singer, songwriter and record producer.

He rose to fame in the 2000s as a member of the P-Square duo with his identical twin brother  Rudeboy and in 2021 was awarded with an honorary Doctorate degree from ESCAE University in Benin Republic.
Mr P and his twin brother known in the showbiz as Rudeboy grew up in a large family, at the capital of Plauteau State, Nigeria.
In 2018 Mr P collabrated with Nyanda of Brick & Lace on a song titled "Wokie Wokie".
In 2013 Peter Okoye and his then-girlfriend, Lola Omotayo welcomed their daughter Aliona in a San Francisco hospital in the United States.
On 17 November 2013 the duo got married at the Ark in Lekki, Lagos, Nigeria.
On June 16, 2016, Mr P was made a Kia motor Ambassador.
